attributes.action: Stop Speculators from undermining the economy for their own personal gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop speculators from undermining the financial system for their own benifit. While they make MILLIONS!!! We loose thousands from our investments. It is not right for our parents to loose their money and struggle with bills while these parasitos do not worry about what they do to the economic position they put small share holders in. If they wish to do this all the gains should be given to the people who work hard to save for their futures, then find out the investments are worthless.
